AUTHOR: Redjumpman modified by LordHighFixxer#7112
INSTALL_MSG:
This cog has no library requirements.
PM me at Redjumpman#2375 on Discord if you have issues.
NAME: Russianroulette-hn
SHORT: Play a game of russian roulette with up to 6 players
DESCRIPTION:
Russian roulette simulator. Only one will survive. Change the initial bet requirement with

russianset. This modification of the cog repairs the highnoon functionality that was non-functional in Redjumpan's prior builds. The original build can be found at https://github.com/Redjumpman/Jumper-Cogs
